org.apache.lenya.cms.publication
Class DocumentTypeBuilderImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
      org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DocumentTypeBuilderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DocumentTypeBuilder, org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.LogEnabled, org.apache.avalon.excalibur.pool.Poolable, org.apache.avalon.framework.service.Serviceable
public final class DocumentTypeBuilderImpl
extends org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.AbstractLogEnabled
implements DocumentTypeBuilder, org.apache.avalon.framework.service.Serviceable, org.apache.avalon.excalibur.pool.Poolable

Avalon Service for building an instance of DocumentTypeusing information from the doctypes.xconf configuration file.

Since this service is very frequently used, it is implemented as a poolable service.

Furthermore, the instances are cached, to avoid re-reading configuration unless the configuration file has changed.

Version:
$Id: DocumentTypeBuilderImpl.java 179575 2005-06-02 12:15:33Z andreas $
